about_the_game:
Take the role of a chef who has been given the task to cook the kings royal feast. There is only one problem... the snacks are missing!

Embark on a hidden object journey where you must find over 50 different snacks & objects across 20 unique medieval style levels. Once completed you will unlock 15 new challenging bonus levels to really test your skills and even replay the levels.

You will have the option to beat the clock or turn it off for a more relaxing experience but don't worry as you'll have time bonuses and even mini games to earn extra hints along your journey that you can store and use at a later time!


Search high and low as you may never know where those pesky snacks are hiding.


Sneaky Snacks is a simple but relaxing game which should take roughly 1-2 hours to complete for intermediate players of this genre! At this current time 36 Steam Achievements are available to be unlocked with more to be released in future for all you achievement hunters and the difficulty ramps up the more you play especially in the bonus levels where the items are extra sneaky... think of the first half of the story mode as a warm up session!

Best of luck!

Why Use AI Art?
Sneaky Snacks features AI Art generated from WOMBO AI's systems. It's a preimum service that requires a payment to use their algorithms and assets and I've used and modifed the art created from it. This is my first major release which I wanted to be cheap for people to play and continue to update weekly to monthly but my goal is to stop using AI art as soon as I can reinvest into my indie developement business to hire artists and sound producers etc
detailed_description:
Take the role of a chef who has been given the task to cook the kings royal feast. There is only one problem... the snacks are missing!

Embark on a hidden object journey where you must find over 50 different snacks & objects across 20 unique medieval style levels. Once completed you will unlock 15 new challenging bonus levels to really test your skills and even replay the levels.

You will have the option to beat the clock or turn it off for a more relaxing experience but don't worry as you'll have time bonuses and even mini games to earn extra hints along your journey that you can store and use at a later time!


Search high and low as you may never know where those pesky snacks are hiding.


Sneaky Snacks is a simple but relaxing game which should take roughly 1-2 hours to complete for intermediate players of this genre! At this current time 36 Steam Achievements are available to be unlocked with more to be released in future for all you achievement hunters and the difficulty ramps up the more you play especially in the bonus levels where the items are extra sneaky... think of the first half of the story mode as a warm up session!

Best of luck!

Why Use AI Art?
Sneaky Snacks features AI Art generated from WOMBO AI's systems. It's a preimum service that requires a payment to use their algorithms and assets and I've used and modifed the art created from it. This is my first major release which I wanted to be cheap for people to play and continue to update weekly to monthly but my goal is to stop using AI art as soon as I can reinvest into my indie developement business to hire artists and sound producers etc

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 (64-bit version of OS is required)
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz or more
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Take the role of a chef who has been given the task to cook the kings royal feast. Embark on a hidden object journey where you must find over 50 different snacks & objects across 20 unique medieval style levels. Once completed you'll unlock 15 new challenging bonus levels to really test your skills.
